= tig =

Webpage: http://jonas.nitro.dk/tig/manual.html

tig                     # List of commits for current branch
tig --all               # Display all branches
tig <branches>          # Display commits from one or more branches
tig <branch>..<branch>  # Display difference between two branches
tig -- <file>           # Display changes for a single file
tig stash               # Display list of stashes
tig grep -p <string>    # Grep all files for string
